name: deepseam
description:
this is my second attempt at a game for this jam., and the second bitsy game ive ever made! it's also the first large-scale (ish??) game i've ever made, and i got really invested in it and am going to try and make something really big out of it.

this is an unfinished version... i don't even know if it's half done yet but i figured i should still upload what i have. that being said, im really grateful for the jam for inspiring this...

if you find any bugs or have any comments or feedback, comment or w/e ! thanks !
